amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the transfer of any U.S. missile equipment or missile-related technology to the People's Republic of China. The amendment is numbered 62 and is made in order as the third amendment in part A of House report 105-544.

action.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 412 - 6 (Roll No. 169).
